home.welcome: Junyoung, a developer who designs trust

meta.title: Junyoung Portfolio
meta.description: Portfolio of Junyoung, a developer who designs trust.

home.description:
Currently seeking new opportunities.
Previously, I designed and developed Lottie-based products at a record platform named 'Jejodo', and as a frontend developer at 'Berapt', I designed and developed two B2C service products.
Leveraging my background in business administration, I focus on problem-solving through collaboration and communication.
Recently, I am interested in enhancing the technical depth of both the team and myself through AI collaboration.

shoulderPick.title: ShoulderPick
shoulderPick.subTitle: sub-culture illustration service
shoulderPick.summary: Launching and maintaining a sub-culture illustration platform

roles.role3: Implementing metadata and structured data for SEO optimization
roles.role5: Integrating external PG (Naver Pay, Kakao Pay, etc.) payment system

shoulderPick.feedRole: Developed interactions such as bookmarks, Picks (votes), and likes for each post in the post list, and implemented RBAC (Role-Based Access Control) system to optimize the rendering of UI elements based on user permissions.
shoulderPick.pickPostUploadRole: Developed post upload and edit features, and implemented sharing functionality to allow users to easily promote their posts on social media.
shoulderPick.shopRole: Independently developed all store features including product listing, details, cart, and payment. Specifically, optimized real-time stock checking and price calculation logic to improve user experience in the cart feature.

shoulder.title: Shoulder
shoulder.subTitle: Creator Support service
shoulder.summary: Launching and maintaining a creator support platform

roles.role2: Designing and implementing common feature modules and design system
roles.role6: Integrating external PG payment system and optimizing logic

achievements.achievement3: monthly paid service revenue of xx

shoulder.gardenMainRole: Developed the post list and detail pages of the creator main page, with a focus on abstracting the board module to allow for the development of various board types in the future.
shoulder.gardenPostUploadRole: Developed a custom plugin that allows emoticons to be inserted into the WYSIWYG editor, and designed and implemented a system where creators can create their own stickers, and users can rent and purchase stickers.
shoulder.gardenSubscribeRole: Developed a creator subscription (recurring payment) system, and optimized the payment logic to handle various exceptions that may occur during payment attempts, focusing on improving user experience.

jejodo.title: Jejodo
jejodo.subTitle: A platform for archiving indie-worker records.
jejodo.summary: Web frontend development for an indie-worker archiving platform.

roles.role2: Gradual migration from JavaScript to TypeScript
